title: Bitcoin Heist (2016)
overview: To catch Interpol's most-wanted hacker, special Agent Dada must assemble a team of criminals: Jack-The Trickster; Vi-The Hacker; Luhan-The Forger; Linh-The Cat Burglar and Phuc-The Inside Man. The latest action-comedy-heist movie of director Ham Tran. Starring Suboi, Petey Majik Nguyen, Thanh My, Nhung Kate, Mai The Hiep, introducing Thanh Pham and special guests Ngo Thanh Van, Teo Yoo.
storyline: Hackers have become the bank robbers in the new world of crypto-currency. In order to catch the most wanted hacker, "The Ghost", an Interpol special agent assembles a team of thieves to plan the ultimate heist. But as any good criminal knows, there is no honor among thieves.
